metadata.title: CVE-2024-36026 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/pm: fixes a random hang in S4 for SMU v13.0.4/11While doing multiple S4 stress tests, GC/RLC/PMFW get intoan invalid state resulting into hard hangs.Adding a GFX reset as workaround just before sending theMP1_UNLOAD message avoids this failure.
